attributes.additional_details:
Other Countries througout the world celebrate Armistace day/Veterans day as a Bank Holiday, yet as far as I am aware, as a Country we never have.

In tribute to those who died all those years ago in giving us the freedom in life that we have today, I feel that the 11th of November 2018 should be made a Bank Holiday, No-one should forget what they did for both the Country and the World.
